ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions to read and write APE-compatible phylogenetic trees in NEXUS and Newick formats, while preserving annotations.
Functions to read and write APE-compatible phylogenetic trees in NEXUS and Newick formats, while preserving annotations.

name: r-phylotate
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-phylotate
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/phylotate_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/phylotate/phylotate_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 97c4b881027c7a6bc1038b815835c42387f0598b6f4a4e23aadb002986dd5324

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('phylotate')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('phylotate')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=phylotate
  license: MIT
  summary: Functions to read and write APE-compatible phylogenetic trees in NEXUS and Newick
    formats, while preserving annotations.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: phylotate
# Title: Phylogenies with Annotations
# Version: 1.3
# Date: 2019-06-29
# Author: Daniel Beer [aut], Anusha Beer [aut]
# Maintainer: Daniel Beer <dlbeer@gmail.com>
# Description: Functions to read and write APE-compatible phylogenetic trees in NEXUS and Newick formats, while preserving annotations.
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# Suggests: ape
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Collate: 'utility.R' 'tokenize.R' 'newick.R' 'nexus.R' 'format.R' 'mbattrs.R'
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-06-29 00:42:39 UTC; dlbeer
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-06-29 21:00:03 UTC
